description: Unidirectional 'Delannoy' variation of the Boustrophedon transform applied to all 1's sequence: construct an array in which the first element of each row is 1 and subsequent entries are given by T(n,k) = T(n,k-1) + T(n-1,k-1) + T(n-1,k) + T(n-2,k-1). The last number in row n gives a(n).
